00089    template <class HDS> 
00090    struct HDSConcept {
00092 
00097       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00099 
00103       void constraints() {
00104          using namespace boost;
00105          function_requires<DefaultConstructibleConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00106          function_requires<CopyConstructibleConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00107          function_requires<EqualityComparableConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00108          function_requires<AssignableConcept<halfedge_descriptor> >();
00109 
00110          h = opposite(hds,h);
00111          const_constraints(hds);
00112       }
00113 
00117       void const_constraints(HDS const& hds) {
00118          h = opposite(hds,h);
00119       }
00120       HDS hds;
00121       halfedge_descriptor h;
00122    };
